title: Chinatown
description: Famous for its colourful heritage buildings and old Chinese shophouses, Chinatown in Singapore is a blend of old and new, hip and traditional. Check out this place to earn 50 points!

title: Merlion
description: The Merlion is a mythical creature with a lion's head and the body of a fish that is used as a national mascot of Singapore. Check out this place to earn 100 points!
